DOC.brief_summary: The study prospective , randomize , parallel-design , multicenter trial patient ≥40 year age undergoing cataract surgery . Patients meet inclusion exclusion criterion randomize 1 2 treatment group - A single 5 mcl anterior chamber injection IBI 10090 , 103.4 mcg/mcl dexamethasone , equivalent dexamethasone dose : 517 mcg conclusion cataract surgery ; - Prednisolone acetate ophthalmic suspension 1 % eye drop administer 1 drop 4 time daily ( QID ) 3 week Safety assess adverse event ( AEs ) , slit lamp biomicroscopy , fundus examination , intraocular pressure ( IOP ) , visual acuity , specular microscopy endothelial cell count .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluate Safety Treatment Inflammation Associated With Cataract Surgery

DOC.criteria: undergo cataract surgery glaucoma patient , pregnancy , allergy dexamethasone
